DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate tolerability safety SAD448 explore compound 's effect intraocular pressure subject ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability , Safety Efficacy SAD448 Subjects With Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Key inclusion criterion : Males female , 18 65 year age , ocular hypertension Females must postmenopausal surgically sterile Key exclusion criterion : Diagnosis glaucoma either eye A history current eye condition medical problem would prohibit use investigational drug
